title: The Music Bundle - 400+ Game Music Pack
description: Unlock the full potential of your game with The Music Bundle – over 400 high-quality tracks spanning multiple genres to elevate your project's audio experience.
longDescription:
Enhance your game's atmosphere with The Music Bundle, a comprehensive collection of over 400 meticulously crafted music tracks tailored to meet all your audio needs. Whether you're creating a thrilling action sequence, a serene exploration environment, or an emotional storyline, this bundle has you covered. With genres ranging from epic orchestral scores and immersive ambient soundscapes to heart-pounding electronic beats and nostalgic retro tunes, The Music Bundle offers unmatched versatility and quality.

TheMusicBundle - YouTube

Features:

  • Over 400 high-quality tracks
  • Diverse genres including orchestral, ambient, electronic, retro, and more
  • Perfect for any game type, from action and adventure to simulation and role-playing
  • Seamlessly integrates with Unreal Engine
  • Royalty-free for use in any project

Elevate your game’s sound design and captivate your audience with The Music Bundle, your ultimate audio resource on the Unreal Marketplace.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Horror pack (38 tracks)
  •  Mystery pack (27 tracks)
  •  Chiptune pack (23 tracks)
  • Orchestral pack (32 track)
  • Dark techno pack (39 tracks)
  • Cyberpunk pack (22 tracks)
  • Atmosphere pack (24 tracks)
  • Handpan pack (19 tracks)
  • Relax pack (45 tracks)
  • Traditional Chinese pack (26 tracks)
  • Combat pack (22 tracks)
  • Electro pack (24 tracks)
  • Classical pack (24 tracks)
  • Joyful pack (30 tracks)
  • Jazz pack (24 tracks)

Number of Audio Wavs: 419

Number of Audio Cues: 419

Sample rate / bit rate: 48000 Hz, 16 bit, Stereo

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 20 hours

Supported Development Platforms: ALL

Important/Additional Notes: If you right click the WBP_MusicPlayer widget in the project file, you can listen all the musics and easily examine them.
